title: Rahu Transit in the 11th House: Expanding Networks and Ambitions
summary: When Rahu transits the 11th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, desires for gains, influence, and social reach intensify. You are drawn to powerful networks, large audiences, and unconventional sources of income. Ambitions accelerate, and goals feel closer, yet impatience can distort judgment. Friend circles shift toward ambitious, results-driven people. This transit favors scaling ideas and monetizing reach, while reminding that ethical alignment and realistic timelines are essential to sustain long-term gains.
closing: Rahu in the 11th house can fulfill big ambitions quickly, but sustainability depends on ethics, focus, and patience.
